name: EG-4 (Eegee-Four)
Lore: 'Very popular droid on inhospitable worlds. Rugged design. Modified top-mounted power sockets. Donated to the Alliance by the Bothan underground.',
Text: 'Adds 1 to power of each of your droids present, except power droids. * Destiny equals zero, but if drawn as a battle destiny where you have less power than opponent, your total power present is doubled (once per battle).',
